title: Album Page, "Elevation of Romanesque-Style Buildings, Perugia", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on off-white wove paper, mounted to off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, upper right corner of sheet: 92; bottom right corner of sheet: Perugia; bottom left corner of sheet: 80. Many other inscriptions with calculations and measurements.
description: This sheet illustrates a quickly sketched elevation, possibly of a campanile with arcades, and to its right, an arched opening.  The sheet is filled with small inscriptions of dimensions and measurements.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Elevation of Romanesque-Style Buildings, Perugia", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Graphite on off-white wove paper, mounted to off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-252.
